solution_line_template: Valerie has to send a thank you card to each of {num_people_thank_ou_cards} people, so she has {num_people_thank_ou_cards} * {cards_per_person} = <<{num_people_thank_ou_cards}*{cards_per_person}={thank_you_cards}>>{thank_you_cards} thank you cards to mail.
She has {more_rebates_than_bills} more rebates than bills, so {more_rebates_than_bills} + {num_bills} = <<{more_rebates_than_bills}+{num_bills}={num_rebates}>>{num_rebates} mail-in rebates to mail.

She has twice as many job applications as rebates, so she has {multiplier_for_applications} * {num_rebates} = <<{multiplier_for_applications}*{num_rebates}={num_applications}>>{num_applications} applications to mail.

She has {thank_you_cards} + {num_bills} + {num_rebates} + {num_applications} = <<{thank_you_cards}+{num_bills}+{num_rebates}+{num_applications}={total_pieces_of_mail}>>{total_pieces_of_mail} pieces of mail to send.

The electric bill needs an extra stamp, so she needs {total_pieces_of_mail} + {extra_stamp_for_electric_bill} = <<{total_pieces_of_mail}+{extra_stamp_for_electric_bill}={total_stamps_needed}>>{total_stamps_needed} stamps.
